title: Alex Padilla - Wikipedia
snippet: Alejandro "Alex" Padilla (born March 22, 1973) is an American politician serving as the senior United States senator from California, a seat he has held since 2021. A member of the Democratic Party, Padilla served as the 30th secretary of state of California from 2015 to 2021 and was a member ...

title: U.S. Senate: U.S. Senator Alex Padilla
snippet: As a State Senator, Alex passed more than 70 bills, including landmark legislation to combat climate change, and was named as one of Sacramento’s "most effective legislators." Alex was sworn in as California’s first Latino Secretary of State on January 5, 2015 and was re-elected in 2018, ...

title: About Alex - Senator Alex Padilla
snippet: For six years, he served as Chair of the State Senate Committee on Energy, Utilities, and Communications, where he was instrumental in developing California’s renewable energy and climate policies—among the most ambitious in the world—as ...

title: California Secretary of State Alex Padilla to take Oath of Office for Second Term on January 7 :: California Secretary of State
snippet: Sacramento, CA – Alex Padilla will take the oath of office for his second term as California Secretary of State on January 7, 2019 at 3:30 pm in the Secretary of State Headquarters in Sacramento. Chief Justice of the California Supreme Court Tani Cantil-Sakauye will administer the oath.

title: Alex Padilla - Ballotpedia
snippet: Kamala Harris became vice president of the United States.[3] [4] [5] Padilla was the California Secretary of State from 2015-2021 and a member of the California Senate from 2006-2014. Padilla was also a member of the Los Angeles City Council from 1999-2006, serving as its president from 2001-2006.
